page.title: 11Children's Games in Bristol
page.content: The games we play at school in Bristol are rounders, cricket, football and netball. Also we go swimming once a week on Tuesdays. We play games on Thursdays. Sometimes we go to the games fields. The girls play rounders in the summer and netball in the winter. The boys play football in the winter and baseball and cricket in the summer. Sometimes I play cricket after school and also French skipping which is played with a long length of elastic. Here are some names of the games - Ibble Obble Black Bobble, Jingle Jangle, Granny put her knickers on, and England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales. For Jingle Jangle you jump in and out of the elastic, either 1 foot at a time, or both feet together and sometimes you stand on the elastic.
